line: well that thing is clearing in the way
huh yeah i guess we are roommates now
well now that you brought it up our fridge is broken
we have to get a new one
now i checked around and your half is 400
i’m not paying for half of that
i’m only staying here until my apartment gets fixed
look rach my parents bought this fridge just after i was born okay
now i have never had a problem with it
then you show up and it breaks
that refrigerators don’t live as long as people
all right now you know that the atm will only lets you take out 300 at a time i’ll take a check for the other hundred
do you guys know any cute guys
my good friend joey over here
anyway there’s this big charity ball this weekend and ralph lauren bought a table so i kinda have to go
i don’t know something either trees or disease ralph mumbles a lot
does ralph mumble when you’re not paying attention
but the thing is need to find a date
well what kind of guy are you looking for
well someone that has his own tux or has the ability to rent a tux
so he has to be a male who has at least 50
y’know this is probably none of my business but weren’t you guys supposed to not be seen in public together
oh no no no we’re just two people who happen to run into each other here at the coffee house
well i really wanted to meet you guys but i have to run
i did not mean to run into you like that sir
oh that is quite all right ma’am
is it a school night and she has a lot of homework to do
yes her molecular epidemiology paper is due tomorrow
oh tell her good luck with that
well y’know it’s just been so long since i’ve been to chuckie cheese
in fact i like her so much you tell her i want my cookies early this year
y’know a box of thin mints and some tag a longs
hey hey come on you guys give him a break
ross seriously how’s it going with her
she’s 20 so she’s not looking for anything too serious which is perfect for me right now
and seriously she seems very nice
i know you guys like to give me a hard time and all but it really means a lot to me that you like her
just knowing that you guys are
okay i got a good one
chandler do you think we talk about our relationship enough
do we have any fruit roll ups
okay i just thought of the perfect guy for rachel to take to her thing
oh that’s so funny because we found someone too
oh that’s good i guess she’ll have a choice between my guy and your weirdo
why would our guy be a weirdo
rachel is not going to pick your stupid guy
my guy is a lawyer who has volunteer work
and he has one of these
well uh y’know our guy works with chandler and he’s really nice and smart and he’s a great dresser
have you seen your guy’s body
no our guy is just a floating head
he’s a massage client and one time umm when he was on the table i looked at it
and i mean all of it
oh yeah like there are police for that
all right fine your guy may have a great body but our guy is really funny
do you want our guy to be your guy
well you don’t look good joe
cold cuts ice cream limes hey what was in that brown jar
so anyway how do you want to pay me
is this a service you’re providing me
for my new fridge our new fridge
look suppose we were a divorced couple
and i got custody of the kid right
now suppose the kid dies and and i gotta buy a new kid
oh a student i don’t know
i was wondering if i could talk to you for a moment
yes yes of course what what would this be regarding
of course why don’t we go inside
umm i actually do need to talk to you
yeah we have time off and a lot of people are going on trips
yes professor feesen sen stenlger i’ll be with you in one moment
so i will take one box of the thin mints
elizabeth was about to ask me to go on a trip with her
no i’m not ready for this
what what do i tell her
oh oh what if she gets upset
then you distract her with a barbie doll
what the hell are you doing
what the hell am i doing
how do you how do you even know its broken
oh ho ho you think i don’t know what breaks my fridge
joey i saw you push him
joey i did not break this
that has been broken for a while
chandler do you remember how i told you about our fridge
i still haven’t gotten a check for your half yet
do not give him any money
you wanted to see me professor geller
yeah it kinda grows on you
actually i wanted to finish talking to you about uh spring vacation
look i look i’m having a great time with you and i just don’t want us to move to fast or put to much pressure on us
so i’m sorry i just don’t think we should go away together yet
ross i think you misunderstood what i was saying
i just wanted to tell you that i’m going to florida for a couple weeks
i think you misunderstood what i was saying
how did it go with elizabeth
uh it was just a misunderstanding
she didn’t want me to go with her
she just wanted to let me know that she’s going to florida for spring vacation
wait a minute is she going for spring vacation or is she going for spring break
well spring vacation is doing nice things with your grandparents
spring break you’re doing frat guys
not all spring breaks are like that
what did you do on yours
i went to egypt with my dad
i can see it now look dad it’s the sphinx
hey i think elizabeth is a little more serious than spring break
i mean she’s taken my class
you guys umm i want you to meet sebastian
we just uh we just met at the newsstand
we both grabbed for the last field stream
can i get you a cup of coffee
rachel what the hell is this
you ask us to find you a guy and you come traipsing in here with your own
we found you a really cute and funny guy from chandler’s work
yeah and i i found you one too who is not a weirdo
well y’know what though you guys
i really appreciate that but i think i’m just gonna take sebastian to the charity
uh would you stop it with that already
so sebastian do you do any volunteer work
no reason it’s just i know a single guy that cares about other people
look i just wanted to have coffee with rachel
well so do a lot of people
actually i uh i gotta get going
oh but y’know no you didn’t give me your phone number
turns out he is kinda funny
he was really nice and he left because of you
yeah y’know what i noticed rachel
is that the kind of guy you’d like to take to a ball
hey sebastian would you like to dance
rachel we’re very sorry that is a very insensitive thing for us to do
let us make it up to you we have two really great guys for you
what have you got to lose
y’know you might even end up with someone really special if you pick my guy
okay so you will meet our guys
okay now it doesn’t matter which one you choose y’know
our guy is perfect or you can go out with the guy phoebe deemed not good enough to go out with herself
okay you broke my fridge you owe me 400 bucks
ooh technically you owe me 600 for sending out happy thoughts on your last ten auditions
well it turns out that she is going to daytona for spring break woo hoo
that means that means wet t shirt contests guys doing shots off of girl’s bodies waking up next to people you don’t even know
man she is going to have a great time
is she staying at the hotel corona
i drove down sold t shirts had a blast
and y’know who knows how to party
ross you can’t tell her not to go
then what am i supposed to do
nothing you just have to be cool with it
well what is she goes down and and sleeps with a bunch of guys
well maybe you don’t marry this one
i’m so glad you’re going on this trip
i’ve been working so hard this semester
i really need to go crazy y’know blow off some steam
look i don’t i don’t know if your plans are finalized yet but umm hey i i know another great way to blow off steam
are you into crafts at all
well yeah of of course i’m okay
supportive of you and this whole trip and and what what is uh what’s this
to wear in front of people
we’re really glad you decided to meet our guy
you’re gonna like him so much
so umm when do you want to meet him
i know i don’t work late tomorrow night
tomorrow night is good but uh y’know what
why put off something till tomorrow that you can do right now
well well a little blind sided but y’know good
because she’s already with our guy
i am too late they’re sitting on the couch and talking
yeah this is the guy i was telling you about
and believe me this suit does not do justice to what’s underneath it
i’m just sort of in the middle of something
this isn’t really worth the free massage
what is the matter with you guys
yeah okay let’s talk it out
i am i the only one that this is embarrassing for
i’ll tell ya who should be embarrassed
thank you very much but i do not need you to get me a date
then why did she ask us to
and then you chase away the one guy that i actually liked
i mean no offense to you guys
i mean congratulations on all the cash and and y’know wow
you do have very soft hair
but i would much rather go to the ball all by myself than go through anymore of this
now do you use some sort of special conditioner on that hair
so uh have a great time down there
and did you did you pack that bathing suit
it was pretty funny when i when i hid it for a while huh
anyway umm i i am worried about that bathing suit not because it’s revealing which i’m fine with no i’m concerned about your health sun exposure
oh don’t worry i have plenty of sun block it’s spf 30
well if what’s in the bottle is actually 30
i mean sometimes you get 30 sometimes it’s it’s get 4 and i swear to god more often than not it’s just milk
ross it’s going to be okay
i’m not going down there to hook up with a bunch of guys
i like how things are going between us
i’m just going down there to relax and hang out with my friends
rachel we’re sorry for pushing those guys on you
y’know i ended up having a really good time
y’know the charity was a big success and they raised a lot of money and awareness
so what was it for anyway
i just got this really weird message from ross
